thread.title: Adele appears to tease music fans with new material in TV ad - Sentinel & Enterprise
thread.title_full: Adele appears to tease music fans with new material in TV ad - Sentinel & Enterprise - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Sentinel & Enterprise
title: Adele appears to tease music fans with new material in TV ad - Sentinel & Enterprise
text:
Four years after her last album, the singer appears to have teased British television viewers with a snippet of new music, broadcast during an ad break on prime-time TV. The 30-second ad shown Sunday evening during TV talent show "The X Factor" featured Adele's distinctive tones over a black screen on which heartache-filled lyrics appeared.
 Sentinel & Enterprise.
